bwwExcerpt: Overall, there is a fairytale-like lightness to the simplicity of the storytelling. This quality charms in places but can seem predictable or overly "on the money" in others. ... However, the fairytale-like script leaves the supporting company, which is made up of strong actors, with underdeveloped characters.
